attributes.action: investigate the outrageous charges levied by ticket agencies for tickets to concerts & sporting events
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is outrageous that ticket agencies are permitted to add additional disproportionate costs to purchase concert tickets etc. How can it be allowed that these organisations can charge any amount, per ticket, as a booking fee and also charge disproportionate amounts for postage. It is time the Government did something to stop this blatant profiteering.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
